snippet: The head of the CJ Group, a major conglomerate in South Korea, was arrested Tuesday on charges of embezzlement and tax evasion amid a wider crackdown on large corporations.
abstract: CJ Group chairman Lee Jay-hyun is arrested on charges of embezzlement and tax evasion amid wider crackdown on large corporations in South Korea; charges come as Parliament enacts series of laws aimed at protecting smaller businesses from corporations that have dominated nation's economy for decades.
lead_paragraph: The head of the CJ Group, a major conglomerate in South Korea, was arrested Tuesday on charges of embezzlement and tax evasion amid a wider crackdown on large corporations.

headline.main: South Korean Executive’s Arrest Seen as Move to Tame Conglomerates
headline.print_headline: Chairman of South Korean Conglomerate Is Arrested on Embezzlement Charge
